brain-adults-1.title: Always On Mode
brain-adults-1.description: An adult professional remains mentally engaged with work even after office hours.

brain-adults-2.title: Responsibility Pile-Up
brain-adults-2.description: An adult manages work, family duties, and personal commitments simultaneously.

brain-adults-3.title: Silent Burn
brain-adults-3.description: An adult feels tired and irritable but continues daily routines.

brain-adults-4.title: Deadline Collision
brain-adults-4.description: Multiple work and personal deadlines fall on the same week.

brain-adults-5.title: Carrying It Home
brain-adults-5.description: Work stress affects mood at home.

brain-adults-6.title: Productivity Guilt
brain-adults-6.description: An adult feels guilty when resting or slowing down.

brain-adults-7.title: Never Enough Time
brain-adults-7.description: An adult feels there is never enough time to complete everything.

brain-adults-8.title: Holding It Together
brain-adults-8.description: An adult feels pressure to appear strong for others.

brain-adults-9.title: Constant Catch-Up
brain-adults-9.description: An adult feels behind despite continuous effort.

brain-adults-10.title: Mental Reset Point
brain-adults-10.description: After prolonged pressure, energy feels low.

brain-adults-11.title: Waiting for the Outcome
brain-adults-11.description: An adult is waiting for an important work or personal outcome.

brain-adults-12.title: Fear of Making the Wrong Choice
brain-adults-12.description: An adult faces a decision with long-term impact.

brain-adults-13.title: What If Loop
brain-adults-13.description: An adult repeatedly imagines worst-case future scenarios.

brain-adults-14.title: Fear of Falling Behind
brain-adults-14.description: Peers appear to progress faster in life or career.

brain-adults-15.title: Fear of Starting Again
brain-adults-15.description: An adult hesitates to restart after a setback.

brain-adults-16.title: Fear of Judgement
brain-adults-16.description: An adult worries about being judged for choices or lifestyle.

brain-adults-17.title: Unclear Future
brain-adults-17.description: An adult feels unsure about long-term direction.

brain-adults-18.title: After the Mistake
brain-adults-18.description: An error occurs at work or in a personal responsibility.

brain-adults-19.title: Pressure to Be Stable
brain-adults-19.description: An adult feels expected to always be financially and emotionally stable.

brain-adults-20.title: Facing the Outcome
brain-adults-20.description: An adult receives an outcome different from expectations.

brain-adults-21.title: Sudden Irritation
brain-adults-21.description: An adult feels irritated during a normal conversation.

brain-adults-22.title: Mixed Feelings
brain-adults-22.description: An adult feels excitement and anxiety about the same situation.

brain-adults-23.title: Emotional Build-Up
brain-adults-23.description: Stressful days pass without emotional release.

brain-adults-24.title: Feeling Disconnected
brain-adults-24.description: An adult feels emotionally distant from daily life.

brain-adults-25.title: Anger Without Warning
brain-adults-25.description: A small event triggers unexpected anger.

brain-adults-26.title: Mood Shifts
brain-adults-26.description: An adult notices mood changes across the day.

brain-adults-27.title: Emotional Spillover
brain-adults-27.description: Stress from one role affects another area of life.

brain-adults-29.title: Expressing Feelings
brain-adults-29.description: An adult struggles to express emotions clearly.

brain-adults-30.title: Emotional Reset
brain-adults-30.description: Emotions feel heavy after a long day.

brain-adults-31.title: Feeling Behind in Life
brain-adults-31.description: An adult compares life progress with peers and feels inadequate.

brain-adults-32.title: Role Overload
brain-adults-32.description: An adult manages multiple identities such as professional, parent, partner, or caregiver.

brain-adults-33.title: Seeking Validation
brain-adults-33.description: An adult's confidence depends on praise or recognition.

brain-adults-34.title: Labeling Yourself
brain-adults-34.description: An adult labels themselves based on one failure.

brain-adults-35.title: Comparing Life Timelines
brain-adults-35.description: Friends reach marriage, career, or financial milestones at different times.

brain-adults-36.title: Confidence Drop
brain-adults-36.description: An adult experiences a setback after consistent effort.

brain-adults-37.title: Identity Drift
brain-adults-37.description: An adult feels unsure about who they are becoming.

brain-adults-38.title: External Success Pressure
brain-adults-38.description: Success is measured against societal standards.

brain-adults-39.title: Self-Image Erosion
brain-adults-39.description: Repeated self-criticism affects confidence over time.

brain-adults-40.title: Identity Reset
brain-adults-40.description: Life changes prompt reassessment of identity.

brain-adults-41.title: Pressure to Keep Peace
brain-adults-41.description: An adult avoids expressing disagreement to maintain harmony in relationships.

brain-adults-42.title: Difficulty Saying No
brain-adults-42.description: Requests from family or colleagues feel constant.

brain-adults-43.title: Emotional Distance
brain-adults-43.description: An adult feels distant in a close relationship.

brain-adults-44.title: People-Pleasing Pattern
brain-adults-44.description: An adult prioritises others' needs over personal limits.

brain-adults-45.title: Social Energy Drain
brain-adults-45.description: Social interactions feel exhausting over time.

brain-adults-46.title: Unclear Boundaries
brain-adults-46.description: Boundaries in work or family are not clearly defined.

brain-adults-47.title: Peer Pressure as an Adult
brain-adults-47.description: Peers influence lifestyle or financial choices.

brain-adults-48.title: Emotional Dependence
brain-adults-48.description: Mood depends heavily on others' reactions.

brain-adults-49.title: Relationship Expectations
brain-adults-49.description: Expectations in a relationship feel heavy.

brain-adults-51.title: Endless Checking
brain-adults-51.description: An adult frequently checks messages and notifications throughout the day.

brain-adults-52.title: Notification Overload
brain-adults-52.description: Multiple alerts interrupt work and personal time.

brain-adults-53.title: Comparison Scroll
brain-adults-53.description: An adult compares life with online content.

brain-adults-54.title: Digital Multitasking
brain-adults-54.description: Multiple apps and tasks are used simultaneously.

brain-adults-55.title: Late-Night Screens
brain-adults-55.description: Screen use continues late into the night.

brain-adults-56.title: Mental Noise
brain-adults-56.description: Constant information intake creates mental clutter.

brain-adults-57.title: Fear of Missing Out
brain-adults-57.description: Seeing others' activities online creates anxiety.

brain-adults-58.title: Online Arguments
brain-adults-58.description: An online discussion becomes emotionally charged.

brain-adults-59.title: Always Available
brain-adults-59.description: Being reachable at all times feels exhausting.

brain-adults-60.title: Digital Reset
brain-adults-60.description: Prolonged digital use causes mental fatigue.

brain-adults-61.title: Loss of Motivation
brain-adults-61.description: An adult feels unmotivated despite responsibilities.

brain-adults-65.title: Overworking Pattern
brain-adults-65.description: An adult works excessively without rest.

brain-adults-68.title: Productivity Guilt
brain-adults-68.description: Feeling guilty for not being productive.

brain-adults-69.title: Energy Mismatch
brain-adults-69.description: Energy levels vary during the day.

brain-adults-71.title: Constant Money Worry
brain-adults-71.description: An adult frequently worries about expenses and financial stability.

brain-adults-72.title: Emotional Spending
brain-adults-72.description: An adult spends money to cope with stress or low mood.

brain-adults-73.title: Comparing Finances
brain-adults-73.description: An adult compares financial progress with peers.

brain-adults-74.title: Fear of Running Out
brain-adults-74.description: Savings feel insufficient for future needs.

brain-adults-76.title: Spending to Belong
brain-adults-76.description: Social situations encourage spending beyond comfort.

brain-adults-78.title: Saving vs Living
brain-adults-78.description: Balancing saving money and enjoying life feels difficult.

brain-adults-79.title: Financial Regret
brain-adults-79.description: A past financial decision causes regret.

brain-adults-81.title: Decision Under Stress
brain-adults-81.description: An adult must make an important decision while feeling emotionally stressed.

brain-adults-82.title: Emotional Reaction
brain-adults-82.description: An emotional response arises during a disagreement.

brain-adults-83.title: Impulsive Choice
brain-adults-83.description: Strong emotions push toward quick action.

brain-adults-84.title: Past Experience Bias
brain-adults-84.description: Past experiences influence a current decision.

brain-adults-85.title: Pressure-Driven Choice
brain-adults-85.description: External pressure pushes for quick decisions.

brain-adults-86.title: Overthinking Loop
brain-adults-86.description: A decision is delayed due to overthinking.

brain-adults-87.title: Emotion vs Logic
brain-adults-87.description: Strong emotions conflict with logical thinking.

brain-adults-89.title: Emotional Regret
brain-adults-89.description: A past decision creates emotional regret.

brain-adults-90.title: Decision Fatigue
brain-adults-90.description: Too many decisions create mental exhaustion.

brain-adults-91.title: Handling Setbacks
brain-adults-91.description: An adult faces an unexpected setback after planning carefully.

brain-adults-96.title: Recovery After Loss
brain-adults-96.description: Loss of an opportunity affects confidence.

brain-adults-97.title: Emotional Endurance
brain-adults-97.description: Long-term pressure tests patience and stamina.

brain-adults-100.title: Resilience Reset
brain-adults-100.description: After prolonged challenges, energy feels low.
